AddOn.Dialog: I... have come!

Everyone only cares about the war!
Why doesn't anyone want to understand each other!?
I will... I will protect everyone!
I have something I want to protect, so I will fight!
Dad, Mom... Watch over me!
I'm still alive! I can still fight!
The pain is nothing compared to her tears...!
I saw her just now... Was she... crying...?
I'm feeling great! I'm charging in!
I'll say a prayer for you.
Your fate has been sealed.
Feel the difference in power between us!
Energy charged 100%... Commence assault!
I'm gonna tear a hole in your body!
Take thiiiiis!
Jumping in front of me without practice!?

Ahh, geez!
If you don't understand, I'm going to make you!
Wahhhh! My body's heating up!!
I'll make it painless for you.
I keep telling you not to go too far ahead!
Heh heh... You're a cute one, li'l missy.
Guess I'm accompanying you to the depths of Hell.
There, there, theeere!
Wahhhh! My body's heating up!!
Don't hate me for this, but I'll have to shoot you down.
You think you can keep track of all my bullets!?
You... You fool!!
Jumping in front of me without practice!?
If shooting you down will end the war... I'll do it!
Hit, hit! I need you to hit! Wahhhh!!
Why's a girl like you on the battlefield!?
Don't come near, you idiot!

Hanging around there like that...
You're just begging to be hit!

Don't come! I'll have to shoot if you do!
...Dammit, too late!
Hmph, were you seized by fear? How sad.

Everyone only cares about the war!
Why doesn't anyone want to understand each other!?
Shoot when you're shot at. It's a simple policy, no?
Gwahhhh! Why do you want war so much!?
There are people who will cry if you die, right!? So don't come here!
Why do you keep firing!? Aren't you and I both humans!?

Shoot down whatever appears before you.
That was what I was taught as far back as I can remember.
Is this the only way...? The war won't end unless I fight...?
I told you to stop!
I don't like war! I hate it! But...!
Don't come any closer! Wahhhh!
Adults are always like this!!
Was that... a girl's voice...?
You can shoot at me all you want, you still won't be able to stop me.
You're the one at fault... You shot at me first!!

You fool! If you shoot, I have to shoot back!
Why don't you understand that!?
A d-direct hit!?
Ooh~! I felt that one~!
Whoa, a direct hit!?
That's how it begins... people die, people seek revenge for them, and the cycle continues!
I said to stop shooting!
The chain of sorrow will never end if you keep on firing!
Ugh! T-That hurt... But everyone in the world is hurting right now!
Why do fellow humans have to shoot at each other!? Why must we inflict so much pain!?
Your attack has no feeling in it, it won't hurt me!
Oh, how striking. No, not your attack. You.
That was painful... But shooting must've been just as painful for you, right!?
You want a war that badly!?
Everyone worked together for this peace, how could you!?
You think the war will end if you shoot me down? You're wrong!
Ah man... This is what I get for looking away.
An arm or two isn't that important!
Dammit... The engine's hit!?
Wounds all over... Now this is interesting!
Too bad, I'm not done yet!
I bet you thought I was down.
Dad... Mom... it huuurts...!
I won't fall here! I'll stand up... I'll stand up and go back to her!
More! Kick me more!
Aim a bit lower!
If your cheek gets kicked, turn the other cheek...
...That's one of my granduncle's lines.
My life isn't worth much, but it's not cheap enough to let myself lose it to you!
She told me to come back alive.
If you're not taking this seriously, get off the battlefield!
Can I withstand this...? No, I HAVE to withstand this!
Haha, life is short, isn't it... Uwahhhhhh!!
Thank you. Now I can be at her... side...
This makes me the 108th person you've killed!

Remember this.
Even if you defeat me, a second, then a third kedama will take my...
O-Ohhhhh!!
I... really didn't care about the war. As long as I could help her...
But now... that's no longer...
U-Uwaahhhhh!!
Getting kicked by a hot chick should be cherished forever...
...That's one of my great-grandfather's lines.
Sorry, I prefer younger women.
Hmph, adios.
